summary: A female superstar struggles through the trials and tribulations of being a Bollywood actress.
cast: Kareena Kapoor|Arjun Rampal|Randeep Hooda|Shahana Goswami|Pooja Chopra|Divya Dutta|Rashmi Nigam|Pallavi Sharda|Ranvir Shorey|Lillete Dubey|Mugdha Godse|Sanjay Suri|Raqesh Bapat|Sakshi Benipuri|Harsh Chhaya|Sachin Danai|G.K. Desai|Kanika Dhillon|Areesz Ganddi|Sanjay Gurbaxani|Pompy Hans|Helen|Dilnaz Irani|Rahul Jaiswal|Imran Khan|Kaizaad Kotwal|Ritesh Naik|Gaurav Nanda|Jignesh Panchal|Amrita Raichand|Durgesh Raje|Dabboo Ratnani|Sujata Sehgal|Shilpi Sharma|Meenakshi Thapa
title: Heroine
